Peggy Bernier https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peggy_Bernier 0 Peggy Bernier (19 March 1907 – 5 March 2001) was a comedian and film actress who was popular in the 1920s and 1930s. Peggy_Bernier ( 19_March_1907 – 5_March_2001 ) was a_comedian_and_film_actress who was popular in the_1920s_and_1930s .
